item.title: merge on factor column
item.description: library("forcats") library("data.table") library("magrittr") I recently started working with factors in R and found the forcats package amazing. However, I did not found much documentation on merging two data frames on a factor column so I made small examples and observed the behavior. same levels, different order In abc order: natural if converting from already ordered character. dt_abc <- data.table(size = as_factor(c("big", "medium", "tiny"))) levels(dt_abc$size) ## [1] "big" "medium" "tiny" We can define the natural order:
